snippet: Mr. Kagame announced his intention to seek a third term in 2017, confirming a decision that was widely expected after the approval of constitutional changes.
abstract: Rwandan Pres Paul Kagame announces he will seek third term in 2017, move widely expected after approval of constitutional changes to election laws that could extend his stay in office until 2034.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kagame announced his intention to seek a third term in 2017, confirming a decision that was widely expected after the approval of constitutional changes.

headline.main: Rwanda: President Paul Kagame Says He’ll Run Again
headline.print_headline: Africa; Rwanda: President Says He’ll Run Again
